1.title: Game of Drones

episode of.title: Stranded with a Million Dollars (TV Series 2017– )

1.plot: Ten people stranded on a remote island for 40 days with nothing but their clothes and one million dollars. They can choose to buy high-priced supplies that could help them win. How much are they willing to pay to survive?

2.title: Group Bye

episode of.title: Stranded with a Million Dollars (TV Series 2017– )

2.plot: The group suffers a major loss on the journey to Camp Two. Hunger, exhaustion, and endless rain take their toll. Alliances fracture during the group buy, and the truth about Gina's temptation could leave her friendless.

3.title: Stirring the Pot

episode of.title: Stranded with a Million Dollars (TV Series 2017– )

3.plot: Tensions rise with only seven people left on the island. With a dangerous storm bearing down on the camp, Makani strikes back against her former friends, while Chris and Alonzo struggle against the elements.

4.title: In-Tents

episode of.title: Stranded with a Million Dollars (TV Series 2017– )

4.plot: Six people remain on the island. With Alonzo's resolve weakening by the day, Alex tries to keep his fragile coalition together. The tent becomes a pawn in the ongoing power struggle, and Cody finds a new ally.

5.title: Pizza, Burgers, and Cards Oh My!

episode of.title: Stranded with a Million Dollars (TV Series 2017– )

5.plot: Alliances are tested as an enticing deal is proposed. A grueling journey deepens the divide between teams. The Campers spend more money, leaving Cody to worry that there won't be any cash left to win in the end.

6.title: Til Sickness Do Us Part

episode of.title: Stranded with a Million Dollars (TV Series 2017– )

6.plot: The Campers are in command going into Camp Six, and they continue to refuse to share food with Team Makody. But when sickness strikes, they are forced to make life-changing decisions that could lose them control of the game.

7.title: Episode #1.7

episode of.title: Stranded with a Million Dollars (TV Series 2017– )

7.plot: It's 2 vs 2 as tensions mount between the 4 remaining players. A challenge forces the group to work together as one team. The competition takes a dramatic turn as two make a bold move in an attempt to get the others out for good

-1.title: Thrive Nugget

episode of.title: Stranded with a Million Dollars (TV Series 2017– )

-1.plot: With the final days of stranded approaching, team Makody declares an all-out war on Alex and Gina. Cody will stop at nothing to get his enemies to quit and does a jaw-dropping plan that takes the game to a whole new level.

imdb.plot outline: The series drops 10 adventurers on an island with nothing but the clothes on their backs and a million dollars in cash. Those who survive for 40 days filled with gut-wrenching journeys and demanding physical challenges will split the money as their prize. The catch? They can buy all of the survival supplies and creature comforts they desire, but everything is crazy expensive (think $30K for a tent), all decisions to make a purchase require a group majority and the cost comes out of their shared prize money.
imdb.title: Stranded with a Million Dollars
